pkgmetadata.longdescription: XStatic-JS-Yaml--------------JS Yaml JavaScript library packaged for setuptools (easy_install) / pip.This package is intended to be used by **any** project that needs these files.It intentionally does **not** provide any extra code except some metadata**nor** has any extra requirements. You MAY use some minimal support code fromthe XStatic base package, if you like.You can find more info about the xstatic packaging way in the package `XStatic`.
